// Language mapping from country codes to language codes const countryToLanguage = { 'KR': 'ko', 'JP': 'ja', 'CN': 'zh', 'ES': 'es', 'PT': 'pt', 'BR': 'pt', 'FR': 'fr', 'RU': 'ru', 'DE': 'de', 'IT': 'it', 'NL': 'nl' }; let currentLanguage = 'en'; // IP-based language detection function async function detectLanguageByIP() { const services = [ 'https://ipapi.co/json/', 'https://ip-api.com/json/', 'https://ipinfo.io/json?token=your_token_here' ]; for (let service of services) { try { const response = await fetch(service); const data = await response.json(); const country = data.country_code || data.countryCode || data.country; if (country && countryToLanguage[country]) { return countryToLanguage[country]; } } catch (error) { console.log(`Failed to get location from ${service}:`, error); } } return 'en'; // Default to English } // Function to apply translations function applyTranslations(lang) { const elements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-translate]'); elements.forEach(element => { const key = element.getAttribute('data-translate'); if (translations[lang] && translations[lang][key]) { element.textContent = translations[lang][key]; } }); currentLanguage = lang; // Update language selector const langBtn = document.getElementById('current-lang'); if (langBtn) { const langNames = { 'en': 'EN', 'ko': '한국어', 'ja': '日本語', 'zh': '中文', 'es': 'Español', 'pt': 'Português', 'fr': 'Français', 'ru': 'Русский' }; langBtn.textContent = langNames[lang] || 'EN'; } } // Initialize on page load document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function() { // Try to detect language by IP try { const detectedLang = await detectLanguageByIP(); applyTranslations(detectedLang); console.log('Language detected:', detectedLang); } catch (error) { console.log('Language detection failed, using English:', error); applyTranslations('en'); } // Add smooth scrolling for navigation links document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => { anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) { e.preventDefault(); const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')); if (target) { target.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } }); }); // Language selector functionality const langBtn = document.getElementById('lang-btn'); const langDropdown = document.getElementById('lang-dropdown'); if (langBtn && langDropdown) { langBtn.addEventListener('click', () => { langDropdown.classList.toggle('active'); }); // Close dropdown when clicking outside document.addEventListener('click', (e) => { if (!langBtn.contains(e.target) && !langDropdown.contains(e.target)) { langDropdown.classList.remove('active'); } }); } // Download carousel functionality const downloadGrid = document.getElementById('download-grid'); const indicators = document.querySelectorAll('.indicator'); let currentSlide = 0; function goToSlide(index) { if (downloadGrid) { downloadGrid.style.transform = `translateX(-${index * 100}%)`; indicators.forEach((indicator, i) => { indicator.classList.toggle('active', i === index); }); currentSlide = index; } } // Auto-advance slides on mobile if (window.innerWidth <= 768) { setInterval(() => { currentSlide = (currentSlide + 1) % 3; goToSlide(currentSlide); }, 5000); } // FAQ functionality window.toggleFaq = function(element) { const answer = element.nextElementSibling; const icon = element.querySelector('.faq-icon'); answer.classList.toggle('active'); element.classList.toggle('active'); }; // PWA install prompt let deferredPrompt; window.addEventListener('beforeinstallprompt', (e) => { e.preventDefault(); deferredPrompt = e; // Show custom install button const installBtn = document.createElement('button'); installBtn.textContent = '📱 Install App'; installBtn.className = 'cta-button'; installBtn.style.position = 'fixed'; installBtn.style.bottom = '20px'; installBtn.style.right = '20px'; installBtn.style.zIndex = '1001'; installBtn.addEventListener('click', () => { deferredPrompt.prompt(); deferredPrompt.userChoice.then(() => { deferredPrompt = null; document.body.removeChild(installBtn); }); }); document.body.appendChild(installBtn); }); }); // Global function for language switching function switchLanguage(lang) { applyTranslations(lang); document.getElementById('lang-dropdown').classList.remove('active'); } // Global function for slide navigation function goToSlide(index) { const downloadGrid = document.getElementById('download-grid'); const indicators = document.querySelectorAll('.indicator'); if (downloadGrid) { downloadGrid.style.transform = `translateX(-${index * 100}%)`; indicators.forEach((indicator, i) => { indicator.classList.toggle('active', i === index); }); } } Halo_workflow - Stop the 80% AI Coding Failure Rate! v2.1

Frequently Asked Questions

What programming languages are supported? ▼

We support 42 programming languages including JavaScript, Python, Java, C++, Go, Rust, and many more.

How does the duplicate detection work? ▼

Our AI analyzes code patterns, import statements, and file structures to identify exact and semantic duplicates in real-time.

Can I cancel my subscription anytime? ▼

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

Is there a free trial available? ▼

We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required.

How secure is my code? ▼

Your code is processed locally on your machine. We never upload or store your source code on our servers.

What platforms are supported? ▼

Halo_workflow runs on Windows 10+, macOS 10.15+, and Linux (via AppImage). All major distributions supported.
